roleset.name: visit again, examine an issue again
roleset.note: REVISIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'revisit' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from revisit.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: fairly typical
example.text: ``Each time [0] the court revisits an issue [*T*-2], the justices will be forced by a dissent to reconsider the fundamental questions and to rethink the result,'' he said.
